{{About|the event material|plaustrite in general|Plaustrite}}
'''Plaustrite Shard''' is a material that can be obtained during the [[Lantern Rite]] [[event]].

==How to Obtain==
*Plaustrite Shards drop as an extra item and need to be picked up separately from:
**{{Item|Iron Chunk|30}}
**{{Item|White Iron Chunk|30}}
**{{Item|Crystal Chunk|30}}
**{{Item|Magical Crystal Chunk|30}}
**{{Item|Starsilver|30}}
**{{Item|Electro Crystal|30}}
**{{Item|Noctilucous Jade|30}}
*Plaustrite Shards do not drop as an extra item and go directly to inventory from:
**{{Item|Cor Lapis|30}}

==Craft Usage==
{{Craft Usage}}

==Trivia==
*Plaustrite is the luminous green material that allows some things to levitate. At the abode above [[Qingyun Peak]] notes left behind read: ''"This place was built on a foundation of Plaustrite, one of the marvels of the world.."''
*Other variations of Plaustrite include:
**{{Item|Vermillionite|30}}
**{{Item|Azurite|30}}
